title: Chandbali Jhumka Earrings with Gemstone Accents
features: Chandbali design with intricate filigree and CZ pave setting. Features a pear-shaped Emerald at the top, accented with a small Ruby. A suspended Lavender Jade sphere adds a touch of modern elegance. Gold beads (gundlu) adorn the lower edge, creating a gentle swaying motion.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi. Also suitable for contemporary parties and celebrations.
description: A stunning blend of traditional Chandbali design with modern gemstone choices. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a rich, lasting luster. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, despite their opulent appearance. A statement piece that adds regal charm to any outfit.
